subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Zenyatta secured a four-and-a-quarter-length victory in the Apple Blossom Invitational Handicap for her 16th straight win against top-level competition.
snippet: Zenyatta secured a four-and-a-quarter-length victory in the Apple Blossom Invitational Handicap for her 16th straight win against top-level competition.
